body: Well. in the end she still only think of him as friend (although, seeing her being cute in the last page, probably loves him already). He also likes her enough to throw away the other girls, so I really hope he would treat her well and step up from just fuck buddies to girlfriend. Author said next episode will be pregnant sex.

The guy is a player, he got sex friends, but had been bored recently. He bumped on his classmate Yui, whom he usually is not interested because despite having a killer body, she's too gloomy, opposite to the gyaru type he usually hangs out with. He tried hitting on her anyway, but her voice is too small, so he just drags her to love hotel, and one-sidedly decide they're now fuck buddy. Apparently, despite her inexperience, sex with her is amazing and he starts to see she's actually cute. They have sex everyday, and he even breaks up with his other girls. Yui felt better, she doesn't complain, and let him do her raw. After two months, they do it in her home and he finally asked her something bothering him: how did she actually felt about him. Yui said he got big attitude and do weird things to her, but he's the first friend she ever had. They had another sex, and he told her they will always be friends.
